reviewText:
This product was way below par - I have been a coach for 40 years and have purchase many, many books,videos and other coaching products. The quality of this video was horrible. I expect to see players and coach demonstrating or at least a whiteboard.  All I saw was this guy Billy Best talking and some (very, very few) grainy footage of Offense vs Defense that looked like it was taken from the next county.

I requested a refund but never heard back from these people. Amazon asked me to give them a chance to make it right, but they didn't. DON'T BUY FROM THEM - you have been warned...
